definition: cool and collected (idiom); showing no sign of nerves/perfectly composed
to talk and laugh as though nothing had happened/to remain cheerful (despite a crisis)

sentences.english: Everyone will be groomed and polished and comfortable with the cameras.
sentences.chinese: 大家將會修飾打扮一番，並且在鏡頭之前坦然自若。

sentences.english: Lincoln was very surprised, but he pretended to be calm.
sentences.chinese: 林肯非常驚訝，但是他假裝鎮靜自若。

sentences.english: The manager sailed into the room.
sentences.chinese: 經理神態自若地走進房間。

sentences.english: The witness remained collected throughout the cross-examination.
sentences.chinese: 證人在整個反詰問過程中保持着鎮靜自若。

sentences.english: The bourgeois talked peaceably to the working-classes of what was in preparation.
sentences.chinese: 資產階級泰然自若地和工人們談論着正在準備中的事。

sentences.english: I'm shaking, trying to hold something inside.
sentences.chinese: 我有點緊張，我努力使自己鎮靜自若。

sentences.english: His calm reception of the bad news surprised his friends.
sentences.chinese: 他聽到壞消息鎮定自若，令他的朋友們驚奇。

sentences.english: Though in great trouble, he kept calm and never gave up.
sentences.chinese: 儘管困難重重，但他卻鎮定自若，決不放棄。

sentences.english: I wanted to be comfortable and hit the ball up the middle.
sentences.chinese: 我想要輕鬆自若一點，想把球敲過中野。

sentences.english: It remains unclear if Apple Computer, poised to launch its line of Intel-powered Macintoshes next year.
sentences.chinese: 他剩餘不明白的如果蘋果電腦泰然自若下水。

sentences.english: The calm demeanour of Mr Trichet and Mr Van Rompuy is not shared by the markets.
sentences.chinese: 特里謝和範龍佩鎮定自若，但是市場卻是惶恐不已。

sentences.english: He kept his countenance in such a dangerous situation.
sentences.chinese: 我們要在危急時刻保持鎮定自若的。

sentences.english: She remained calm in the face of great danger.
sentences.chinese: 在非常危險時，她仍然鎮定自若。

sentences.english: When we disagree, we should agree to disagree agreeably.
sentences.chinese: 當我們不同意對方的意見時，我們也應該鎮靜自若。

sentences.english: This sangfroid could be tested by several threats.
sentences.chinese: 這種泰然自若的姿態要經受多種威脅的考驗。

sentences.english: He was always composed; his manners, except on one or two occasions, were impeccable .
sentences.chinese: 他一直神態自若，除一兩次外，舉止態度都無懈可擊。

definition: cool and collected (idiom); showing no sign of nerves/perfectly composed
to talk and laugh as though nothing had happened/to remain cheerful (despite a crisis)
to be calm and unruffled in the midst of chaos or at a busy time (idiom)
neither too fast nor too slow (idiom)
to remain calm in the face of events (idiom)
see 泰然處之|泰然处之[tai4 ran2 chu3 zhi1]
neither haughty nor humble/neither overbearing nor servile/neither supercilious nor obsequious
